New Records: Kylian Mbappé has now been involved in 80 goals for France in 78 games.
Kylian Mbappé scored his 47th goal for Les Bleus.
Key Match Events: Randal Kolo Muani headed in from a precise Mbappé pass just before the break.
Jonathan Clauss' thunderous strike from outside the box doubled the advantage in the 70th minute.
Mbappé sealed the win with a low, first-time shot in the 85th.
Mbappé added a third 15 minutes later with a low, first-time shot from near the penalty spot.
Pre-Game Insights: The article does not contain any pre-game insights.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Didier Deschamps praised Mbappé, saying he is a 'formidable leader ever since he's been with us.'
Didier Deschamps also mentioned that Mbappé's head and body weren't used to playing very much these past couple of weeks, so some juice was missing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luxembourg missed out on what could have been their first-ever major tournament with a 2-0 loss to Georgia in their Euro 2024 qualification playoff semi-final.
Forward Bradley Barcola made his France debut when he replaced Marcus Thuram in the 81st minute.
Others: France will play Canada on Sunday in Bordeaux in their last warm-up match before Euro 2024 starts on June 14.
